PDF file of 3315 bytes taken from https://www.tagg.org/pdftest.pdf.

Smallest use case (ABAP >= 4.6C):
- [Code to display PDF in SAP GUI](Code-to-display-PDF-in-SAP-GUI): `lcl_pdf_in_sap_gui=>show( lcl_smallest_pdf_binary=>get( ) ).`

Other use cases:
* TODO

Code of class `lcl_smallest_pdf_binary` (>=ABAP 4.6C):

  PUBLIC SECTION.
    CLASS-METHODS get RETURNING VALUE(xstring) type xstring.
ENDCLASS.
